511930.name: Handsome Mr. Frog OST
511930.description:
The Handsome Mr. Frog Official Soundtrack by ZBWmusic.

Tracklist
1. The Handsome Mr. Frog
2. Mr. Frog is Enjoying a Nice Cup of Tea at the Outset of What is Sure to be a Great Adventure
3. Mr. Frog is a Cold Blooded Amphibian and Thus Does Not Care Much For the Cold
4. Mr. Frog Contemplates the Meaning of Human Architecture and Its Place in Frog Society
5. Mr. Frog Recognizes That There are Some Things in This World That are Beyond Mortal Reckoning
6. Mr. Frog Assesses His Highest Scoring Potential
